intro: Psychotria macrothyrsa, commonly known as the giant psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its large, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It often grows in humid, shaded environments within the understory of tropical rainforests. Psychotria macrothyrsa is also noted for its potential medicinal properties, though further research is needed to confirm its efficacy.
